trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Remove-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Remove-TypeData

trans-unit.source: Remove-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Remove-TypeData

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Deletes extended types from the current session
trans-unit.target: 從目前的工作階段刪除延伸類型

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: RemoveTypeDataSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: RemoveTypeDataSet （預設值）

trans-unit.source: RemoveTypeSet
trans-unit.target: RemoveTypeSet

trans-unit.source: RemoveFileSet
trans-unit.target: RemoveFileSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Remove-TypeData** cmdlet deletes extended type data from the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** cmdlet 會從目前的工作階段刪除延伸的類型資料。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet affects only the current session and sessions that are created in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 只會影響目前的工作階段和在目前工作階段中建立的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: You can add properties and methods to objects in Windows PowerShell by defining them in Update-TypeData commands and Types.ps1xml files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以 Update-typedata 命令與 Types.ps1xml 檔案中定義，來將屬性和方法加入至 Windows PowerShell 中的物件。

trans-unit.source: **Remove-TypeData** deletes those extended properties and methods from the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** 會從目前工作階段中刪除那些延伸的屬性與方法。

trans-unit.source: **Remove-TypeData** does not delete the Types.ps1xml files or delete any extended type definitions from the Types.ps1xml files.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** 不會刪除 Types.ps1xml 檔案或刪除 Types.ps1xml 檔案中的任何延伸的類型定義。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Types.ps1xml files, see about_Types.ps1xml (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113274).
trans-unit.target: 如需 Types.ps1xml 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Types.ps1xml (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113274)。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: This command deletes from the session all type data for the System.Array type, including type data that was added by a Types.ps1xml file and dynamic type data that was added to the session by using the Update-TypeData cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會刪除 System.Array 型別，包括由 Types.ps1xml 檔案所新增的型別資料並新增至工作階段使用 Update-typedata cmdlet 的動態型別資料的所有類型資料的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Example 2
trans-unit.target: 範例 2

trans-unit.source: This command shows the effect of removing extended type data from a session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示從工作階段移除延伸類型資料的效果。

trans-unit.source: Example 3
trans-unit.target: 範例 3

trans-unit.source: This command removes all extended type data for module objects.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會移除模組物件的所有延伸類型資料。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an object to **Remove-TypeData**, **Remove-TypeData** gets the name of the object type and removes all type data for all objects of that type.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用管線傳送物件 **Remove-typedata**, ，**Remove-typedata** 取得的物件型別名稱，並移除所有該類型的所有物件類型資料。

trans-unit.source: Example 4
trans-unit.target: 範例 4

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Path** parameter of the **Remove-TypeData** cmdlet to remove the extended types that are defined in the Types.ps1xml files that are added by the **PSScheduledJob** and **PSWorkflow** modules.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **路徑** 參數 **Remove-typedata** 指令程式可移除所加入的 Types.ps1xml 檔案中所定義的延伸的類型 **PSScheduledJob** 和 **PSWorkflow** 模組。

trans-unit.source: This command does not affect dynamic type data that is added by using the Update-TypeData cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不會影響使用 Update-typedata cmdlet 所加入的動態型別資料。

trans-unit.source: The command succeeds only when the modules have been imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 只有在模組已經匯入目前的工作階段時，命令才會成功。

trans-unit.source: For more information about modules, see about_Modules (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144311).
trans-unit.target: 如需模組的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Modules (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144311)。

trans-unit.source: Example 5
trans-unit.target: 範例 5

trans-unit.source: This command removes extended types from a remote session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從遠端工作階段移除延伸類型。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to remove extended type data for all CIM types in the sessions in the $s variable.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 $s 變數中工作階段中移除所有的 CIM 類型的延伸的類型資料。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Deletes from the session extended type data that is defined in the specified files.
trans-unit.target: 從指定檔案中所定義的工作階段延伸類型資料刪除。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter the paths and file names of one or more Types.ps1xml files.
trans-unit.target: 輸入一或多個 Types.ps1xml 檔案的路徑與檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the path, the default location is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 若省略路徑，則預設位置為目前目錄。

trans-unit.source: -TypeData
trans-unit.target: -TypeData

trans-unit.source: Delete the specified type data from the session.
trans-unit.target: 從工作階段刪除指定類型資料。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains **TypeData** objects (**System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData**) or a command that gets **TypeData** objects, such as a **Get-TypeData** command.
trans-unit.target: 輸入變數，其中包含 **TypeData** 物件 (**System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData**) 或可取得命令 **TypeData** 物件，例如 **Get-typedata** 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe **TypeData** objects to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線 **TypeData** 物件加入至 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: -TypeName
trans-unit.target: -TypeName

trans-unit.source: Deletes all extended type data for the specified types.
trans-unit.target: 刪除指定類型的所有延伸類型資料。

trans-unit.source: For types in the System namespace, enter the short name.
trans-unit.target: 對於系統命名空間中的類型，請輸入簡短名稱。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the full type name is required.
trans-unit.target: 否則，需要完整類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: You can pipe type names to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送至型別名稱 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an object to **Remove-TypeData**, **Remove-TypeData** gets the type name of the object and removes all type data for the object type.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用管線傳送物件 **Remove-typedata**, ，**Remove-typedata** 取得物件的型別名稱，並移除所有類型資料的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData

trans-unit.source: You can pipe **TypeData** object, such as the ones that the Get-TypeData cmdlet returns, to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送 **TypeData** 物件，例如為 Get-typedata 指令程式傳回的項目 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe the type names to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送至的型別名稱 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an object to **Remove-TypeData**, **Remove-TypeData** gets the type name of the object and removes all type data for the object type.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用管線傳送物件 **Remove-typedata**, ，**Remove-typedata** 取得物件的型別名稱，並移除所有類型資料的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: **Remove-TypeData** can remove only the extended type data in the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** 可以在目前工作階段中移除延伸的類型資料。

trans-unit.source: It cannot remove extended type data that is on the computer, but has not been added to the current session, such as extended types that are defined in modules that have not been imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 它無法移除已在電腦上但尚未新增至目前工作階段的延伸類型資料，例如尚未匯入目前工作階段之模組中定義的延伸類型。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Get-TypeData

trans-unit.source: Update-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Update-TypeData

trans-unit.target: about_Types.ps1xml
